help:
Comandes disponibles: 
 - /author: shows author's name and email 
 - /show: shows the available quizs 
 - /select <quiz name>: selects one of the available quizs 
 - /quiz: asks the user the different questions of the selected quiz 
 - /diagram: shows the diagram of the selected quiz 
 - /pie <question name>: shows a pie with the results of the selected question 
 - /bar <question name>: shows a bar with the results of the selected question
